page.title: 08School Activities
page.content: raises money to buy equipment for our school. Our school is a very nice school and I am very happy there. The choir practices once a week. We sing lots of different types of songs. This year we have sung in the Annual Carol Service, a Victorian Musical, the Church Garden Party and most weeks in our Assembly. This year we were also invited to sing for Radio Tees at Christmas. In Instrumental Club you can learn a lot about music and play a lot of tunes that are very nice. There are six groups of Recorders. They meet every week for half an hour, from beginners to very advanced Tenors, Trebles and Descant. Cricket is held on Tuesday from 6.00pm to 7.00pm but sometimes it goes on to 7.30pm or even 8.00pm.
